name: MALABAR AA
description: From the experience of a few small farms in the tropical forest of India , for centuries this coffee has been grown with ethics and sustainability.

name: PAPUA NUOVA GUINEA
description: In the mountainous Bismark archipelago of Papua New Guinea, guarded by the famous paradise birds, lies a cultivation of Arabica Coffee.

name: AFRIBON
description: Giovanni Erbisti 1953's African Coffee Arabica blend is making a coming back to life. This easy, super creamy coffee defines it self by its own definition: that's Afribon.

name: DECAFFEINATED
description: Cultivated in Guatemala it is a decaffeinated coffee of Arabica blends, creamy, round and regular with an aftertaste of dried fruit and dark chocolate.

name: GIOVANNI ERBISTI 1947
description: This coffee is a selection of four different kinds of Arabica each one roasted separately. Sweetness balanced by the right acidity and salinity.

name: CUBA
description: A Caribbean coffee with a Natural Arabica blend harvested and selected manually from the eastern region of Cuba.

name: ARABICA NATURALE
description: The indication ‘Arabica Naturale’ describes a natural Arabic coffee blend, where only the mature cherries are scrupulously Choose.

name: ARABICA NATURALE
description: Arabica wholemeal  single-origine. The coffeee comes from an island in the Indonesian archipelago, it has not been washed before the roasting.

name: CHICKMAGALUR KARNATAKA
description: Cultivated at 1100 m of  altitude, near the village of Magalùr, is a single Variety of Arabic. Harvested by hand it is washed twice.

name: GUATEMALA
description: The volcano coffee, soaked only by its fragrance, is the Guatemala N. 100% Arabica coffee selected and roasted by the Jamaica Coffee Roasting Laboratory - Verona.

name: American pancake
description: Ingredients: Caramel creme and fruit like strawberries and banana

name: American pancake
description: Ingredients: nutela and fruit like bananas and strawberries

name: American pancake
description: Ingredients: maple sirup and fruit like bananas, strawberries and blueberries

name: American pancake
description: Ingredients: maple sirup and forest strawberries

name: American pancake
description: Ingredients: nutela and fruit like blueberry and blackberry

name: Frozen America pancake
description: Ingredients: Blueberry creme and frozen fruit like blueberry and blackberry
